1.title: Jasmine
1.plot: Jasmine Roman is an OVERCOMER, excelling in high school despite her challenging circumstances. Her story highlights how a mentor helped her overcome obstacles and achieve her dream of attending college. This award-winning documentary was produced for the American Graduate: Let's Make It Happen national initiative, with NALIP, and funded by the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.

2.title: Myles
2.plot: Myles is an OVERCOMER, excelling in high school despite his challenging circumstances. His story highlights how a mentor helped him overcome obstacles and achieve his dream of attending college. It was produced for the American Graduate national initiative with NALIP, and funded by the Corporation for Public Broadcasting.

imdb.plot outline: "Overcomers" is a documentary-series short made for TV and new media that features two teenagers, one female and one male, who are succeeding in high school despite their challenging circumstances. The program will highlight the importance of mentorship by also interviewing who has helped keep them motivated to stay in school and earn their diplomas.
imdb.title: Overcomers
plot: "_Overcomers_ (qv)" is a documentary-series short made for TV and new media that features two teenagers, one female and one male, who are succeeding in high school despite their challenging circumstances. The program will highlight the importance of mentorship by also interviewing who has helped keep them motivated to stay in school and earn their diplomas.::Lone Stars Entertainment
